entry.title: WIND WARNING, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:13 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7Â°C

Observed at: Elk Island National Park 4:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
